notifications.notification_game_won_text: The {game_title_link} collaboration is closed. Your iteration: "{winning_title}" has been unanimously chosen as the winner!
notifications.notification_game_closed_text: The {game_title_link} collaboration is closed. The winning text is "{winning_title}"
notifications.notification_game_invitation_text: You've been invited to collaborate on {game_title_link}
notifications.warning_game_won_text: The winning vote was just cast! The {game_title} collaboration is closed. Your iteration: "{winning_title}" has been unanimously chosen as the winner! Sadly, the text you are working on is no longer in the running.
notifications.warning_game_closed_text: The winning vote was just cast! The "{game_title}" collaboration is closed. The winning text is "{winning_title}". Sadly, the text you are working on is no longer in the running.

about.title: About Tag You Write
about.description: A collaborative writing platform where creativity meets community.

creator.bio: Created by MÃ©lisandre, a developer who believes in the power of collaborative storytelling.

home_error.default_error_message: Congratulations! Getting lost is the first step in getting anywhere worthwhile.

cr_it_ed.good_to_know_text:
While your title and prompt will be carved in STONE, your text will be rehashed by all who join the game.

May the best iteration win!
cr_it_ed.prompt_placeholder: Instructions: how to run away from yourself, when you are also chasing yourself...
cr_it_ed.writing_placeholder: When you climb out the window, don't forget your rainboots.
cr_it_ed.joinability_disabled_message: The game cannot be joinable by all if it is not visible to all.
cr_it_ed.access_control: who can interact with your game

game_settings.visible_to_all_description: Anyone can see this collaboration in lists and searches
game_settings.visible_to_invited_description: Only invited collaborators can see this collaboration
game_settings.joinable_by_all_description: Anyone can contribute to this collaboration
game_settings.joinable_by_invited_description: Only invited people can contribute to this collaboration

note-edit.change_note_message: Oops! You can change your note:
note-edit.leave_note_message: Oops! You can leave a note for other writers:

general.gameRemoved: Game no longer matches your search/filters

home_index.title: collaborative writing
home_index.add_a_few_words: Add a few words to someone else's.
home_index.write_a_sentence: Write a sentence, and see it grow legs.
home_index.write_a_phrase: Write a phrase, and watch its head roll away.
home_index.collaborate_step_one_text: Create an account and/or log in.
home_index.collaborate_step_two_text: Click on the (top menu) to enter our library, where you can expand and explore collaborations.
home_index.collaborate_step_three_text: Choose a story node that inspires you, change the text ("iterate"), and publish your version when you're ready to share.
home_index.collaborate_step_four_text: Vote on a winning text. The first text to get upvotes from all collaborating writers wins!
home_index.how_to_start_new_collaboration: how to start a new collaboration
home_index.create_collaboration_step_one_text: Create an account and/or log in.
home_index.create_collaboration_step_two_text: Click on the (top menu) to start a new collaboration. You will be asked to create a title, a prompt, and a starting text. All future collaborators will consult yout title and prompt while they write. When you're ready to share, just publish .
home_index.create_collaboration_step_three_text: Let your friends know! Or wait for someone from our community to contribute.

games.noGamesMessage: No games found matching your current filters

warning.add_note: Your note will be public, but you can edit it any time.

warning.new_game: Ready to start a new game? This action cannot be undone.
warning.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this text? This action cannot be undone.
warning.last_vote: This vote confirms the grand winner and ends the game. Are you sure?

account_created_email.email_title: Welcome to the Tag You Write family
account_created_email.email_message: Welcome {name}! Tag you write is an experiment. I'm hoping it will be a fun way to write small pieces collaboratively. If you have any issues with your account, or any feedback, just hit "reply". Thanks for participating!

password_reset.email_message:
Click the following link to reset your password: 

{resetUrl}
password_reset.email_sent: Password reset link has been sent to your email

game_invitation.subject: {inviterName} invites you to collaborate on "{gameTitle}"
game_invitation.message:
Hello {recipientName},

{inviterName} has invited you to collaborate on a writing project called "{gameTitle}".

Prompt: {gamePrompt}

Click the link below to join the collaboration:
{invitationUrl}

Happy writing!

The Tag You Write Team

d3_visualization.unavailable_message: The D3 library could not be loaded. Please check your internet connection or contact the administrator.

substeps.navigation: Click the login button in the navigation.
substeps.credentials: Enter your credentials or create an account.

substeps.symbol: Click the symbol. Where is it? Top navigation, or overflow menu (depends on your screen size).

substeps.create: Choose a title. Create a prompt. Write a starter text. Consider the relationship between these as a playground--foster tension, conflict, poetry, existential questions.
substeps.publish: When ready, "publish" to launch the experience, or you can always second guess yourself and delete everything, or save what you have as a draft.

substeps.congratulations: ð Congratulations! You've successfully started a game! The tutorial is now complete.

contribute.title: How to Contribute to a Game

substeps.dashboard: Click on the dashboard icon in the navigation or in the overflow menu .
substeps.explore: Explore "Stories I Can Join". Click on the library icon for a detailed list view OR directly on the category name, and then on any title, to view just that story.
substeps.view: Click on a title to view the story tree or shelf .

substeps.explore: Click on hearts / titles. Explore evolving stories. Choose a text you'd like to push in a new direction.
substeps.iterate: Click the "iterate" button, to start writing.

substeps.write: Change the text. Do so judiciously and fearlessly. Describe your changes in three words. If you want, add a keyword or two... we might use them to organize the stories some day.
substeps.publish: When ready, "publish" to make your iteration available to others, or you can delete your iteration, or save what you have as a draft.

substeps.congratulations: ð Congratulations! You've successfully published your contribution! The tutorial is now complete.

vote.title: How to Vote on Text Nodes

substeps.dashboard: To vote on stories you've contributed to, start by visiting your dashboard (from the navigation or overflow menu ). *New? The "Contribute to a Story" tutorial will help you get started.
substeps.active: In "My Stories" > "Active", look for shared collaborations. Click on the "Active" library icon for a detailed list OR directly on the category name, and then on any title.
substeps.view: Click on a title to view the story tree or shelf .

substeps.explore: Click on hearts / titles. Explore how a story evolves. Determine which contributions you like.
substeps.vote_action: Click on the heart paddle to vote/unvote. Don't see a heart paddle? Is this node yours? Have you only drafted (not published) a contribution?

substeps.congratulations: ð Great! You've cast or uncast your vote! The tutorial is now complete.
